
example( alias )
    Runs examples for a specified alias.

    Parameters
    ----------
    alias: any
        Alias (an object path string or reference).

    Examples
    --------
    > example( {{alias:@stdlib/math/base/special/sin}} )
    > example( '{{alias:@stdlib/math/base/special/sin}}' )


example( property )
    Runs examples for a specified property.

    Parameters
    ----------
    property: any
        Alias property (an object path string or reference).

    Examples
    --------
    > example( {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from )
    > example( '{{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from' )


example( instance )
    Runs examples for a provided class instance.

    Only direct instances of documented built-in constructors are supported.

    Parameters
    ----------
    instance: any
        Class instance.

    Examples
    --------
    > example( new {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}( 10 ) )

    See Also
    --------
    help, info
